item.title: Oven baked white beans
item.description: Oven baked white beans Bill of material No exact quantity is given here, you have to adjust to your taste. White beans, dry Rosemarry Garlic Salt (Optionnal) Mustard Ketchup / BBQ Sauce Chilli Worcestershire sauce Soy sauce Smoked paprika Firm tofu Onions How ? Soak the beans overnight and cook them with a pressure cooker for 30 minutes. You don’t want them to be cooked too much, a bit firm should yield a better result in the end.

item.title: Pizza Dough
item.description: Pizza dough Disclaimer : The recipe comes from this video : Pizza dough Bill of Material Water: 200 ml Dry yeast: 1 gram Honey: 1 gram 000 Flour: 300 grams Salt: 5 grams Olive Oil: 10 grams How ? Add all water with yeast, honey and 2/3 of the flour. The result should be a loose paste almost liquid. We are basically creating a levain here. Wait 1 hour for the levain to ferment and bubble Add the remaining ingredients and mix.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Trying out Hugo ! Just some guy trying Hugo to make a personnal website with Github pages. Nothing fancy, nothing revolutionnary.
